verses.verse: שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> to me רֹ֥דְפֵי <S%H7291><s%> to me ye that follow after צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <S%H1245><s%> ye that seek יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> unto the rock חֻצַּבְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2672><s%> [whence] ye are hewn וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מַקֶּ֥בֶת <S%H4718><s%> and to the hole בּ֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> of the pit נֻקַּרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H5365><s%> [whence] ye are digged

הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> Look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham אֲבִיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> your father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> and unto Sarah תְּחוֹלֶלְכֶ֑ם <S%H2342><s%> [that] bare כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> When אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> him alone קְרָאתִ֔יו <S%H7121><s%> you for I called וַאֲבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed וְאַרְבֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> him and increased ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed נִחַ֨ם <S%H5162><s%> shall comfort יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion נִחַם֙ <S%H5162><s%> he will comfort כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חָרְבֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H2723><s%> all her waste places וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and he will make מִדְבָּרָהּ֙ <S%H4057><s%> her wilderness כְּעֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> like Eden וְעַרְבָתָ֖הּ <S%H6160><s%> and her desert כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> like the garden יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> joy וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> and gladness יִמָּ֣צֵא <S%H4672><s%> shall be found בָ֔הּ תּוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> therein thanksgiving וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <S%H2172><s%> of melody ס

הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> unto me my people וּלְאוּמִּ֖י <S%H3816><s%> unto me O my nation אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> and הַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> and give ear כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For תוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> for a law מֵאִתִּ֣י <S%H853><s%> תֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> shall proceed וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <S%H4941><s%> from me and I will make my judgment לְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> for a light עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אַרְגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H7280><s%> to rest

קָר֤וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near צִדְקִי֙ <S%H6664><s%> My righteousness יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> is gone forth יִשְׁעִ֔י <S%H3468><s%> my salvation וּזְרֹעַ֖י <S%H2220><s%> and mine arms עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> the people יִשְׁפֹּ֑טוּ <S%H8199><s%> shall judge אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אִיִּ֣ים <S%H339><s%> the isles יְקַוּ֔וּ <S%H6960><s%> shall wait וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about זְרֹעִ֖י <S%H2220><s%> upon me and on mine arm יְיַחֵלֽוּן׃ <S%H3176><s%> shall they trust

שְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up לַשָּׁמַ֨יִם <S%H8064><s%> to the heavens עֵֽינֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> your eyes וְֽהַבִּ֧יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> and look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth מִתַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> beneath for the heavens כֶּעָשָׁ֤ן <S%H6227><s%> like smoke נִמְלָ֙חוּ֙ <S%H4414><s%> shall vanish away וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the earth כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> like a garment תִּבְלֶ֔ה <S%H1086><s%> shall wax old וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and they that dwell כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> in like כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְמוּת֑וּן <S%H4191><s%> therein shall die וִישֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <S%H3444><s%> but my salvation לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <S%H6666><s%> and my righteousness לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not תֵחָֽת׃ <S%H2865><s%> shall not be abolished ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me יֹ֣דְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> unto me ye that know צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people תּוֹרָתִ֣י <S%H8451><s%> [is] my law בְלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> in whose heart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> fear חֶרְפַּ֣ת <S%H2781><s%> ye not the reproach אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> of men וּמִגִּדֻּפֹתָ֖ם <S%H1421><s%> of their revilings אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תֵּחָֽתּוּ׃ <S%H2865><s%> neither be ye afraid

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> like כַבֶּ֙גֶד֙ <S%H899><s%> like a garment יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <S%H398><s%> shall eat them up עָ֔שׁ <S%H6211><s%> For the moth וְכַצֶּ֖מֶר <S%H6785><s%> them like wool יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <S%H398><s%> shall eat סָ֑ס <S%H5580><s%> and the worm וְצִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> but my righteousness לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become וִישׁוּעָתִ֖י <S%H3444><s%> and my salvation לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> from generation דּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1755><s%> to generation ס

עוּרִ֨י <S%H5782><s%> Awake עוּרִ֤י <S%H5782><s%> awake לִבְשִׁי־ <S%H3847><s%> put on עֹז֙ <S%H5797><s%> strength זְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> O arm יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God ע֚וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> awake כִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> days קֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> as in the ancient דֹּר֖וֹת <S%H1755><s%> in the generations עוֹלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> of old הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> you הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> who הַמַּחְצֶ֥בֶת <S%H2672><s%> [Art] thou not it that hath cut רַ֖הַב <S%H7294><s%> Rahab מְחוֹלֶ֥לֶת <S%H2490><s%> [and] wounded תַּנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> dragon

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> you הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> who הַמַּחֲרֶ֣בֶת <S%H2717><s%> [Art] thou not it which hath dried יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea מֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> the waters תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> deep רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> of the great הַשָּׂ֙מָה֙ <S%H7760><s%> that hath made מַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> the depths יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way לַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass over גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1350><s%> for the ransomed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <S%H6299><s%> Therefore the redeemed יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְשׁוּב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> unto Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> with singing וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> and everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> [shall be] upon their head שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> and joy יַשִּׂיג֔וּן <S%H5381><s%> they shall obtain נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <S%H3015><s%> [and] sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <S%H585><s%> and mourning ס

אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> who מְנַחֶמְכֶ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> I [even] I [am] he that comforteth מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> you וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <S%H3372><s%> you who [art] thou that thou shouldest be afraid מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> of a man יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> [that] shall die וּמִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> and of the son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man חָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> [as] grass יִנָּתֵֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> [which] shall be made

וַתִּשְׁכַּ֞ח <S%H7911><s%> And forgettest יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹשֶׂ֗ךָ <S%H6213><s%> thy maker נוֹטֶ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> that hath stretched forth שָׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> and laid the foundations אָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַתְּפַחֵ֨ד <S%H6342><s%> and hast feared תָּמִ֜יד <S%H8548><s%> continually כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> every day מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> because חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> of the fury הַמֵּצִ֔יק <S%H6693><s%> of the oppressor כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> as if כּוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> he were ready לְהַשְׁחִ֑ית <S%H7843><s%> to destroy וְאַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> where חֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> ? and where [is] the fury הַמֵּצִֽיק׃ <S%H6693><s%> of the oppressor

מִהַ֥ר <S%H4116><s%> hasteneth צֹעֶ֖ה <S%H6808><s%> The captive exile לְהִפָּתֵ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> that he may be loosed וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> and that he should not die לַשַּׁ֔חַת <S%H7845><s%> in the pit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֶחְסַ֖ר <S%H2637><s%> should fail לַחְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3899><s%> nor that his bread

וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> But I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God רֹגַ֣ע <S%H7280><s%> that divided הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea וַיֶּהֱמ֖וּ <S%H1993><s%> roared גַּלָּ֑יו <S%H1530><s%> whose waves יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name

וָאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> And I have put דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> my words בְּפִ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> in thy mouth וּבְצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> thee in the shadow יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> of mine hand כִּסִּיתִ֑יךָ <S%H3680><s%> and I have covered לִנְטֹ֤עַ <S%H5193><s%> that I may plant שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וְלִיסֹ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> and lay the foundations אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְלֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and say לְצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> unto Zion עַמִּי־ <S%H5971><s%> Thou [art] my people אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you ס

הִתְעוֹרְרִ֣י <S%H5782><s%> Awake הִֽתְעוֹרְרִ֗י <S%H5782><s%> awake ק֚וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> stand up יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁתִ֛ית <S%H8354><s%> which hast drunk מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> at the hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כּ֣וֹס <S%H3563><s%> the cup חֲמָת֑וֹ <S%H2534><s%> of his fury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֻבַּ֜עַת <S%H6907><s%> the dregs כּ֧וֹס <S%H3563><s%> of the cup הַתַּרְעֵלָ֛ה <S%H8653><s%> of trembling שָׁתִ֖ית <S%H8354><s%> thou hast drunken מָצִֽית׃ <S%H4680><s%> [and] wrung [them] out

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There מְנַהֵ֣ל <S%H5095><s%> [There is] none to guide לָ֔הּ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> her among all the sons יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> [whom] she hath brought forth וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> is none מַחֲזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> neither [is there any] that taketh בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> her by the hand מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> of all the sons גִּדֵּֽלָה׃ <S%H1431><s%> [that] she hath brought up

שְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> These two הֵ֙נָּה֙ <S%H2007><s%> These קֹֽרְאֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H7122><s%> [things] are come מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> unto thee who shall be sorry לָ֑ךְ הַשֹּׁ֧ד <S%H7701><s%> for thee? desolation וְהַשֶּׁ֛בֶר <S%H7667><s%> and destruction וְהָרָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> and the famine וְהַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> How אֲנַחֲמֵֽךְ׃ <S%H5162><s%> by whom shall I comfort
